tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CookingTechniques (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technique_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cooking_techniques (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  technique_name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE culinary_tips (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tip_title VARCHAR(50),
  tip_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_cooking_progress (
  user_id INT,
  recipe_id INT,
  progress_percentage INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, recipe_id)
)

CREATE TABLE favorite_recipes (
  user_id INT,
  recipe_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, recipe_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Recipes (
	recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	recipe_name VARCHAR(50),
	description TEXT,
	chef_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (chef_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserComments (
	comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	recipe_id INT,
	comment TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES Recipes(recipe_id)
);
